title: retro message
description:
Retro Message, with its vast black-and-white vintage film library, brings a new twist to messaging.

“Dedicated to the early pioneers of filmmaking—and the filmmaker in all of us”.

Retro Message lets you select a black-and-white vintage retro film clip, choose a quote from a vintage movie or create your own message to superimpose over the selected clip, select your film score sound track, then send your retro message — that’s it! And hey, the first 3 are free! After that, you’ll need a retro membership, but we’ve streamlined the process to keep pricing low.
